Her full thanks go to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase garlic seeds and manure.

loans.name: Urmila

texts.en:
Urmila, aged 51 years, lives in the small village of Anandanagar in Maynaguri in the district of Jalpaiguri with her husband, Rajnarayan, and two sons. Both of the sons are students. One is in grade 12, and the other is in college. Urmila is illiterate; she did not get elementary education due to her parents’ poor financial resources. Her husband studied up to grade 10.

Her husband is engaged in a small business. He has a small store where he sells basic necessity items. But there are a few other such stores in her neighborhood, so he has to compete with them. For this reason, he earns very little, which is not sufficient to cover the basic needs of their family.  

Thus, Urmila has decided to help her husband by doing a business of her own. She wants to start a business of bags. She learned to stich bags in her childhood. Now she wants to execute her knowledge of making bags to help her family financially. She will sell these bags in the locality and to her neighbors. 

Urmila has taken a loan from BJS to purchase the necessary items, such as leather and other tools, to start the business as soon as possible. She is experienced in this field. Moreover, she is well known by her neighbours in the area, so she hopes to gain many customers; this will allow her to earn more income.  

She aspires to give proper education to her children with the additional profit from this business, and at the same time, help her husband by giving financial help to run the family smoothly. She wants to grow her business for their secured future.

She thanks her lenders (BJS and Kiva) for funding the loan, which will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase necessary items, such as leather and other tools, to start a business of making bags.

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
Meet Kadiatu, a 22-year-old from Waterloo2, Sierra Leone. She is married with one child. In 2002, Kadiatu established her retail business. She began her business because she wanted to empower herself. She works at the business from 8 a.m. until 5:30 p.m. six days per week. She says that the main challenges to her business are price inflation and not having a proper business location.

Kadiatu requires a loan in order to purchase cigarettes, drinks and soap to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to change her status of living and increase her business. In the future, Kadiatu plans to expand her business more than ever. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, drinks and soap to sell in her store.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan estudio hasta cuarto grado, se casó a la edad de los veinte y cinco  años, a procreo tres  hijos con su pareja, su esposa es ama de casa, es gente muy humilde y trabajadora,  ella es la que se encarga de las labores del hogar, tiene gallinas y cerdos los que en gorda para posteriormente venderlos, solo el hijo de 18 años vive con él, está estudiando, los demás ya se casaron.


Él es agricultor, tiene más de veinte años de realizar la actividad, su padre desde pequeño le enseño que la vida solo se vivía bien, si trabajaba honradamente, cuando alguien lo busca que le ayude a trabajar también lo hace, también cuida 40 vacas que son de un hermano de él, con la leche de las vacas las procesa a cuajada y queso y una parte la vende y el otro para consumo. La distancia que recorre es variable, ya que no siempre va al mismo lugar, cuando saca la cosecha una parte la vende y lo demás para el gasto, su hijo se involucra en la actividad, el trabajo lo hace por la mañana de 6:00 am a 12:00 md. y por la tarde le da comida el ganado.


El proyecto que realizara con el préstamo que esta solicitando CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar 4 animales de repasto, para luego venderlo y con esto genera un ingreso a su hogar, con lo que mejorara sus activos  y podrá ampliar la producción y tendrá más posibilidades para su hijo que está estudiando.

Su sueño es que su hijo se prepare en la educación y  poderlo sacar adelante por medio del sacrificio que incurre tener hijos estudiando, espera que su hijo se prepare para que un día sean él  que le ayude  en su vejez, todo esto lo logra con la bendición de Dios y su esfuerzo.
texts.en:
Juan attended school up to 4th grade, got married at 25 and had three children with his partner. His wife stays at home and takes care of the household tasks. They are modest and hard-working and have hens and pigs, which are fed and sold afterwards. Only their 18-year old son lives with them and attend school. The others already got married. 

He works in agriculture and has over 20 years of experience. His father taught him when he was a little boy that life only could be lived right if he had an honorable job. He also works when someone needs him and takes care of 40 cows who belong to his brother. The cows' milk makes junket and cheese, and he sells part of it and keeps the rest for their use. He does not always go to the same work place, so the distance he needs to travel every day changes. He sells part of the harvest and keeps the rest. His son gets involved in the activity and they work from 6am to 12pm and feed the cattle in the afternoon. 

He will use the loan from Credicampo to buy 4 animals that he would feed and sell to obtain some income for the household. This way he would be able to increase his assets, expand production and provide his son with more opportunities. His dream is for his son to continue studying thanks to his support. He expects that one day, when he gets older, his son will help him with God's blessing and hard work.

loans.use: to buy 4 animals to be fed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cooking oil, rice, and cooking seasoning to expand her business.

loans.name: Luz Elena

texts.es:
Luz tiene 41 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno  grado, ella siempre quiso continuar estudiando, pero pero no pudo por las dificultades económicas de su familia, ella es madre soltera de 2 hijos entre 14 y 18 años de edad, ellos viven en casa y estudian, y son los únicos que dependen de Luz.

Los oficios domésticos, es la actividad a la cual ella se dedica, también tiene una tienda en su casa y es otra fuente de ingresos para sacar adelante a sus hijos pues no tiene ayuda de nadie para mantenerlos, ella ya tiene varios años de dedicarse a esta actividad, fue por iniciativa propia que ella decidió emprender el negocio de la tienda, ella es muy reconocida en la comunidad y eso hace que atraiga a muchos clientes, y son sus hijos quienes se involucran ayudando en la tienda.

Luz siempre ha deseado mejorar, ampliar y surtir su negocio, es por ello que ahora está solicitando este crédito, para invertirlo en su tienda, comprar mas productos para vender y de esta forma tener mas surtido el negocio.

Su mayor sueño para un futuro es ampliar la tienda y convertirla en un mini-súper donde los clientes encuentren todo lo que busquen y se sientan satisfechos, además le gustaría tener una mejor vivienda, que sus hijos que sean personas de bien, que sigan estudiando y logren sacar una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Luz is a 41-year old woman who studied up to 9th grade. She wanted to continue in school, but had to quit because of the financial difficulties of her family. She is a single mother of 2 children between 14 and 18 years old, who live at home, study and depend on Luz. 

She works offering household services and also has a store at home, which is a second income source to support her children not having anyone to help. She has worked in this activity for several years after taking the initiative to start her business. She is respected in the community, which attracts many clients. Her children get involved and help with the store. 

Luz has always wanted to improve, expand and stock her business, which is why she is now requesting a loan. She plans to invest it in the store, buy additional products to sell and further stock her business. Her biggest dream is to expand the store and turn it into a small super where clients would find everything they needed and felt satisfied. She would also like to have a better house and to see her children becoming good persons and studying a college degree.

loans.use: to buy more products for her store.

loans.name: Wendy Suyapa

texts.es: Wendy es una mujer de 40 años de edad quien es casada y madre de cuatro hijos la cual se graduó en la secundaria como enfermera auxiliar pero no desempeña su profesión de forma permanente ya que no hay plazas en los centros y hospitales, clínicas entre otras y lo hace en ocasiones y por corto tiempo. Ella se dedica al cultivo de hortalizas (papa) ya que en ocasiones consigue trabajo por contrato con sus diferentes patronos, pero también tienen en compañía de su esposo su propia parcela de tierra en la cual trabajan quedando más ganancia y más satisfacción del trabajo que es llevado a cabo. Dicha actividad la aprendió desde muy joven en compañía de sus padres ya que ellos trabajan la tierra cultivando gran variedad de producto. Como persona necesita un empleo para poder generar ingresos en su hogar, ser apoyo en el mismo y poder dar a sus hijos una educación como la que ella tuvo o mejor por lo que ella sueña ver a sus hijos graduados como ingenieros agrónomos ya que ella considera que el conocimiento agrícola que ellos tienen es muy importante. Wendy solicita apoyo económico para poder comprar los insumos que necesita para poder asistir sus cultivos de hortalizas (papa) ya que tienen una cantidad de semilla la cual esta germinando y otro cultivo que está en proceso de desarrollo por lo que necesita abono, fertilizantes entre otros para evitar que sean dañados por las plagas y se pierda el trabajo.
texts.en:
Wendy, age 40, is married and has four children.  She graduated from secondary school as an nurse’s aide.  However, she does not practice her profession in a permanent way because there are no openings at the centers, hospitals or clinics, etc.  She works on occasion and in the short term.

She grows vegetables (potatoes).  She sometimes gets work by contract with different employers.  However, she and her husband also have their own piece of land.  They work there and are left with more profits and more satisfaction from the work they have done.

She learned this business activity from her parents when she was very young.  They worked the land and grew a great variety of products.  She needs a job in order to be able to generate income for her household, to be a help to her household, and to be able to give her children an education like she had or better.

She dreams of seeing her children become graduates in agricultural engineering.  She believes that the agricultural knowledge that they have is very important.

Wendy is requesting financial support to be able to buy the supplies that she needs to be able to care for her potato crops.  They have a quantity of seeds that are germinating and another crop that is in the developmental process.  That is why she needs compost and fertilizers, among others, to avoid them being damaged by pests and losing her work.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to care for her potato crops.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es:
Oscar tiene 41 años de edad, sus padres eran muy pobres y solo alcanzaban a cubrir su alimentación, es por eso que Oscar no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, él está acompañado y tiene 3 hijos y uno de ellos le enseñó a leer y escribir. 

Oscar es agricultor, desde que estaba pequeño su padre le enseñó a preparar la tierra y a sembrar el cultivo del maíz, ahora que es una persona adulta cultiva 2 hectáreas de maíz y también cuida unas vacas que le brindan leche para el sustento de su familia.

Él invertirá el crédito para comprar insumos para su milpa, comprará abono, fertilizantes, etc, cultivará dos hectáreas mas y su padre le ayudará a realizar el trabajo.

El sueño de Oscar es que sus dos hijos menores puedan seguir yendo a la escuela y sabe que lo logrará con la ayuda del crédito que esta solicitando, ya que sus ingresos aumentarán y hará que su nivel de vida mejore.
texts.en:
Oscar is a 41-year old man whose parents were very poor and could only cover his food expenses. This is why Oscar did not have the opportunity to study. He lives with his life partner and has 3 children, one of whom taught him how to read and write. Oscar is a farmer. His father showed him how to prepare the land and cultivate corn. He now cultivates 2 hectares of corn and takes care of some cows that give him milk for the family. 

He plans to use the loan to buy supplies for his crop, including fertilizers. He will cultivate 2 hectares more and will count with his father's help. 

His dream is for his two younger children to continue studying. He knows he will be able to achieve his goal thanks to the loan as his income will increase and their quality of life will improve.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his crop, including fertilizers.

loans.name: Jameela

texts.en: Jameela is a 38-year-old married woman who lives in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband owns an Islamic book depot and earns a sufficient income from this business. Her husband’s book depot is situated in the market. This is the reason his sales and earnings are very good. The demand for Islamic books and the Holy Qur'an has been increasing and he has been managing it thorough his personal sources. But this time demand increases are extraordinary and he does not have sufficient savings to buy more books to cope with the demand. Therefore, Jameela has requested a loan from Kiva's field partner BRAC Pakistan. This will enable her husband to buy the Islamic books and easily cope with the increasing demand. She is very glad after taking this loan and praises the lenders who are taking an active part in supporting her.

loans.use: to buy more Islamic books for resale.

loans.name: Leidi Carolina

texts.es:
Leidi de 34 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está casada, su pareja trabaja en la agricultura también se dedica a la pesca y mecánica de carros, tienen cuatro hijos todos viven con ella, los más grandecitos van a la escuela, también vive una hermana con ella, los que depende de ella solo son sus hijos.

Ella vende pescado fresco del que saca su esposo del rio, tiene dos años de realizar la actividad, la necesidad de tener ingresos la llevo a iniciar este negocio. Antes de dedicarse a la actividad solo era ama de casa, la venta la realiza por toda la comunidad de casa en casa, recorre un aproximado de 5 km diarios, el esposo es quien pesca para que ella venda. El horario de venta es de 7 am a 10 am.
 

El préstamo será invertido en la compra de trasmallos para la pesca, el mejoramiento será el poder seguir realizando la actividad sin pausa, la necesidad satisfecha será el tener su propio equipo de trabajo.


Los sueños que tiene es crecer siempre en las ventas y con eso tener mejores ingresos, con lo que se da a conocer cada vez más a más personas.
texts.en:
Leidi, age 34, went to school through the sixth grade.  She is married, and her life partner works in agriculture.  He also devotes himself to fishing and is a car mechanic.  They have four children, and all of them live with her.  The oldest children go to school.  A sister also lives with her.  Her children are the only ones that are dependent upon her.

She sells fresh fish that her husband gets from the river.  She has been doing this for two years.  The need to have income drove her to start this business.  Before this business activity she was only a housewife.  

She makes her sales by going house to house through her entire community.  She covers approximately five kilometers a day.  Her husband is the one who fishes so that she can sell.  Her schedule for selling is from 7:00 a.m. until 10:00 a.m.

She will use the loan to buy fishing nets.  The improvement will be the ability to continue doing this business activity without stopping.  The need that will be met will be having his work equipment.

Her dream is for her sales to always grow.  With this they will have better earnings, and she will become more well-known.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets.

loans.name: German

texts.es: German se dedica a la elaboración de trajes, su esposa trabaja en labores de limpieza. German necesita credito para la compra de material de construcción (cemento, ladrillos, etc.) ya que su casa necesita reparaciones.German tiene 4 hijos y esta haciendo todo lo posible para darles mas comodidad La familia vive en La Paz
texts.en: German works in dressmaking and his wife provides cleaning services. German needs the loan to buy construction materials (cement, bricks, etc.) so that he can make the necessary repairs in his house. German has 4 children and works very hard to provide them with a better quality of life. They all live in La Paz.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to make repairs in his house.

loans.name: Sonja

texts.en:
Sonja is 49, married and a mother of three children, (two girls and a boy). Her husband is a policeman and until one year ago she used to be a house-wife. Now she works hard and owns a food shop to help earn income for her family. In the beginning it was very difficult for her because of the economic crisis, but now she is more than happy with the income that she earns from her business. 

Sonja’s market is open to everyone in her community and she serves all sorts of products for the various tastes and needs of people. At this time she is requesting a loan to purchase food products for her market and to add inventory in order to increase the variety and potential sales. She hopes that this will then increase her income and therefore improve the living conditions of her family. Her goal is to expand her business in the future and continue to be able to support and contribute to her family. She is very happy for the financial support from Kiva lenders. She would like to thank them all.

loans.use: To purchase food products for her market and to add inventory in order to increase the variety and potential sales

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his study.

loans.name: Rosalyn

texts.es: Rosalyn es casada y tiene dos hijos vive en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento Rosalyn vive con sus padres y ellos son dueños de la casa. Rosalyn trabaja como cocinera, se levanta de madrugada y vuelve muy tarde a casa, por lo que esta expuesta a asaltos Rosalyn necesita credito para comprar una mesa, horno y otros insumos para su negocio de comida. Rosalyn y su esposo son las unicas fuentes de ingreso en la casa, el esposo le ayuda en el negocio de comida
texts.en:
Rosalyn is married and has 2 children. They live in La Paz with Rosalyn's parents, in a house made of brick and cement. Rosalyn works as a cook, wakes up at dawn and comes back home very late, making her to be exposed to assaults. 

Rosalyn needs the loan to buy a table, an oven and other supplies for her food business. Rosalyn and her husband are the only income sources in the house. Her husband helps in the food business.

loans.use: to buy a table, an over and kitchen supplies for her food sales business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more good quality cosmetics to meet her customers' demand.

loans.name: Florencio De Los Ángeles

texts.es:
Florencio tiene 30 años de edad, no logró estudiar porque sus padres desde muy pequeño lo mandaron a trabajar  pues eran de las personas que creían que no lograrían sacar ningún provecho del estudio, ahora él está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

Florencio se dedica a la siembra de maíz, esta actividad la aprendió de sus padres desde pequeño,  ahora él sigue con la misma tradición de cultivar maíz, además tiene una yunta de bueyes con los cuales hace viajes de leña a los vecinos.

Él solicita este préstamo para poder sembrar una hectárea de maíz, quiere preparar la tierra que su padre le esta prestando para poder trabajar y quiere comprar los insumos y fertilizantes que utilizará para sacar la cosecha y obtener mejores ganancias que el año pasado.

El sueño de Florencio es que su padre ya no trabaje y para ello él debe demostrar que puede solo, sin que el negocio tenga pérdidas y sabe que lo puede lograr con la ayuda del crédito.
texts.en:
Florencio, age 30, did not go to school because his parents sent him to work when he was very little.  They were the type of people that believed that school provided no benefit.  He is now in a relationship, and his life partner devotes herself to the household chores.

Florencio grows corn.  He learned this business activity from his parents when he was little.  He now continues with the same tradition of growing corn.  He also has a pair of oxen with which he transports firewood to his neighbors.

He is requesting this loan to be able to plant a hectare of corn.  He wants to prepare the land that his father is lending him in order to be able to work.  He wants to buy supplies and fertilizers that he will use to get the harvest and to get better earnings than last year.

Florencio’s dream is for his father to no longer work.  Therefore, he needs to demonstrate that he is able to do it alone without the business having losses.  He knows that he can do it with the help of the loan.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy newborn chickens, food concentrate and vaccines.

loans.name: Rizwana Group

texts.en:
Rizwana is a 37-year-old woman, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of five children. Her husband is an electrician and he has been running his electric store for the past three years. He is responsible for feeding his entire family and fulfilling their needs.

Rizwana's husband has to purchase electrical merchandise (e.g., wires, tube lights, plug shoes, and other electric devices), but due to insufficient financial means, he cannot afford to purchase these items for his business purpose.

This is a group loan and Rizwana is the leader for this group. Therefore, she has applied for a Kiva loan from BRAC Pakistan, so that she can help her husband to purchase this merchandise, as per his business needs. This loan will also allow her husband to increase the size of his business and earn maximum profit.

Rizwana and her co-borrower, Aabida, are very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy some wood and nails to making Birds case making

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies.

loans.name: Marco

texts.es: Marco es casado tiene un hijo, vive en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que es de su propiedad y tiene todos los servicios, hasta gas domiciliario. Marco es transportista y necesita credito para mantenimiento de vehiculo  Marco es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por eso necesita ayuda
texts.en: Marco is married and has one son. They live in their own house, made of brick and cement, in La Paz. He has all the utilities in place, including gas. Marco works as a driver and needs the loan to maintain his vehicle. Marco is the only income source of his household, which is why he needs financial support.

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
María, se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de dos estantes, frijoles, bebidas, papel higiénico, azúcar, sal, pan, etc., dará una mejor imagen de sus productos, tendrá surtido el inventario para cubrir las necesidades de sus clientes y podrá seguir elaborando los tamales.
Con el préstamo anterior tuvo la facilidad de fortalecer el negocio con productos que le permitieron mejorar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos, actualmente ha cancelado sus deudas y tiene una estabilidad económica mucho mejor con la que su familia vive en mejores circusntancias.
texts.en:
María is requesting a new loan to buy two shelves, beans, beverages, toilet paper, sugar, salt, bread, etc. This investment would give a better image to his products, would increase the inventory and better cover the needs of her customers, and would allow her to keep making "tamales" (pasty made of corn flour). 

Thanks to her previous loan, she was able to expand her business, improve sales and increase her income. She has repaid all her debts and has financial stability, providing her family with better life conditions.

loans.use: to buy two shelves, beans, beverages, toilet paper, sugar, salt, bread, etc.

loans.name: Aminata

texts.en:
Meet 42-year-old Aminata from Waterloo Western rural in Freetown in Sierra Leone. She is married with four children. For over 15 years, Aminata operated her retail business. She began her business because she wants to create a permanent source of income for her family. She works at the business from 8:00am until 5:30 pm, seven days per week. She says that the main challenges to her business are price inflation and proper business location.

Aminata requires a loan in order to purchase food containers, plates, and cups to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to change her status of living and increase her business. In the future, Aminata plans to expand her business more than ever. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase food containers, plates, and cups to expand her business.

loans.name: María Ofelia

texts.es:
María es una mujer pujante y dinámica, que ha sacado adelante a sus 5 hijos con el sudor de su frente, trabajando arduamente para conseguir el sustento diario, pues su ex esposo la dejó con toda la responsabilidad y la carga económica, desde hace muchos años. Con gran esfuerzo y dedicación logró brindarles educación y hoy en día todos son profesionales.
Durante 35 años ha trabajado como comerciante independiente, en un puesto ambulante de venta de herramientas, su negocio está ubicado en una calle del centro de la ciudad, por lo que tiene gran afluencia de personas, sin embargo, es una zona en la que se enfrenta diariamente a la venta de estupefacientes y prostitución, lo que hace un poco difícil su estancia en el sector, a pesar de ser reconocida por su amplia trayectoria en el mismo punto.
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de herramientas al por mayor (martillos, alicates, metros, clavos, puntillas, destornilladores), esto le permitirá tener más variedad de artículos para ofrecer y así mejorar las ventas e ingresos.
María manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es adquirir su pensión por vejez y disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida en compañía de su familia.
texts.en:
María is a hard-working and active woman who has been able to support her 5 children working hard to bring home the bacon. Her ex-husband left her with all the responsibility and financial burden many years ago. Thanks to her hard work and dedication, she has been able to provide her children with education and they are all professionals now. She has worked as an independent saleswoman for 35 years, selling tools in a mobile stand. Her business is located in a central street, so she has many customers. However, that area also hosts the drugs and prostitution businesses, which does not help her despite being well-known for her experience. 

She is requesting a loan to buy tools in bulk (hammers, pliers, rulers, nails, tacks, screwdrivers), which would allow her to offer more variety of products and to improve sales and earnings. 

María says that her biggest dream is to obtain her pension of old age and to enjoy a better quality of life with her family.

loans.use: to buy tools in bulk (hammers, pliers, rulers, nails, tacks, screwdrivers).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, biscuits, and soap to expand her business.

loans.name: Innocent

texts.en: Innocent is a repeat client of our organization who is requesting a loan for UGX.1,500,000. He is 32 years old and a resident of Rwakahinju, where he lives with his wife and one child. He earns a living by running a boda boda or motorcycle taxi and supplements the income he makes there by farming. His dream is to expand his business by buying a piece of land in the near future on which he can build a house for his family. He plans to pay for it by using the income from his motorcycle business. His main challenge has been insufficient capital but with this loan from UGAFODE, Innocent is hopeful he will do well.

loans.use: to pay for a piece of land

loans.name: M. Younas

texts.en:
M.Younas, aged 52, is an honest person living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. He is a milkman by profession. He sells milk and bull calves to the butcher. He has been doing this business for many years and generating reasonable income for his family. He has a few buffaloes and cows and produces milk two times a day from his cattle. He provides door to door milk to his customers also and is paid on a monthly basis. He found that he can produce more milk from buffaloes instead of cows, so he plans to buy a buffalo. The price of a buffalo is more than the price of a cow, and he does not have enough savings to buy a buffalo. Therefore, M.Younas has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that he would be able to buy a buffalo for producing more milk.

M.Younas wants to keep buffaloes in addition to cows to grow the production of milk,and wants to maintain his cowshed as well. He hopes that he would be able to buy a buffalo and would be able to get maximum income. All of his efforts are aimed at improving the well-being of his family members. M.Younas thanks Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy an additional buffalo to increase the production of milk.

loans.name: Trancito Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Trancito  de 29 años de edad, estudio hasta cuarto grado,  se casó a la edad de los dieciocho años, procrearon tres hijos con su pareja. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca, la actividad la realiza a diario. Ella solo se dedica a los trabajos de la casa y cuando la pesca es buena, sale a vender de casa en casa por la comunidad donde vive. Dos de sus hijos viven con ellos el otro ya está aparte.
 

Trancito no tiene un negocio al cual se dedique, solo es ama de casa, donde dedica a los quehaceres de hogar y al cuidado de sus animales de corral, es una mujer luchadora que ve en ella una fuerza de trabajo, que la pone al servicio de su familia, ella se levanta a las 5 de la mañana a empezar sus quehaceres diarios, hasta el anochecer.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar un trasmallo para la pesca, ya que el que tenían ya no sirve, el mejoramiento será poder tener sus propias herramientas de trabajo y ya no andar buscando cada ves que realiza la actividad.
 

Su sueño es lograr  mantener su familia siempre unida es lo más importante, luego luchar siempre cada día contra todas las adversidades, lo que espera a futuro es por heredarles un buen ejemplo de responsabilidad a sus hijos; el préstamo le ayudara en solventar la necesidad antes mencionada, de la ganancia de la venta de pescado espera pagar la cuota y mantener su hogar.
texts.en:
Trancito is a 29-year old woman who studied up to 4th grade, got married at 18 and had three children with her partner. Her husband is a fisherman and works daily. She is a housewife and also sells door-to-door in her community when the catch is good. Two of their children live with them and the other lives independently. Trancito does not have a business herself but works at home, taking care of all the household tasks and their pen animals. She is a hard-working woman who gives everything for her family. She wakes up at 5am to start with her daily tasks and does not stop until dusk. 

She is requesting a loan to Credicampo to buy a net for fishing, as the one they have no longer works. This would allow them to have their own tools instead of searching for them every time they need it for the activity. 

Her dream is to keep her family always together and to be able to fight against the adversities every day. She wishes to provide her children with a good example of responsibility in the future. The loan will help them with the mentioned necessity and she expects to repay the loan with what they will earn from the fishing activity, as well as to cover household expenses.

loans.use: to buy a fishing net.

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.ru: Дилафруз жительница района Гиссар. Она трудолюбивая и ответственная женщина в возрасте 37 лет. Сегодня она хочет начать сельскохозяйственную деятельность. Дилафруз и ее муж знают технологию выращивания сельскохозяйственной культуры. Они уже приобрели орошаемый участок земли в своем селе и подготовили почву для посева. Однако для купли семян им не хватило средств. Поэтому Дилафруз просит кредит, чтобы купить семена картофеля и лука. К лету они хотят собрать богатый урожай и получить хорошую прибыль от новой деятельности. Дилафруз знает, что только с с вашей поддержки это будет реально.
texts.en: Dilafruz is a resident of the Gissar District. She is a hardworking and responsible 37-year-old woman. Currently, she wants to start an agricultural business. Dilafruz and her husband know the techniques for growing crops. They have already purchased an irrigated plot of land in their village and have prepared the ground for sowing. However, they do not have enough money to buy seeds. This is why Dilafruz is requesting a loan to buy potato and onion seeds. By summer, they want to gather a large harvest and receive a good profit from this business. Dilafruz knows that only with your support will this become a reality.

loans.use: to buy potato and onion seeds to begin her agricultural business.

loans.name: Iveta

texts.en:
Iveta is 40 years old. She has a vocational education and a specialty of nurse. Since 1994, she has worked at the Sevan Psychiatric Hospital as a nurse on duty. She lives in the village of Varser, in the Gegharkunik region. Iveta is married and she has a daughter who is already a student, and also a school-aged son. Her husband works as a hairdresser in a Sevan City beauty salon. Her retired mother-in-law also lives with them. 

Despite that both Iveta and her husband are employed, it does not keep them from working in farming and agriculture. On her farm, Iveta has two cows, a calf, ten sheep, seven lambs, and 20 chickens. All these farm goods give her milk and other dairy products, meat and eggs, the sale of which brings a decent income to her family. Iveta also has a tillage on which she cultivates mainly potatoes and greens, which she sells to re-sellers, and also a hayfield, which provides hay for her farm cattle.

Iveta asks for a loan of AMD 600,000 (Armenian drams) since she needs to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her potato cultivation, with the hope of having a profitable sale of potatoes in the future.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her potato cultivation.

loans.name: Balsam

texts.en: Balsam is 21 years old, single and lives in Gaza city with her family in a small simple house. Her father is an employee in the public sector where he earns a low income that is the family's sole means of support. Balsam is a student in a local university where she studies Arts and Humanities. ِShe would like to finish her studies and find a job in the future to help her family to pay its expenses. She is requesting a loan in US dollars from FATEN that she can use to buy a new laptop to use for her studies, including competing home work and reading articles online.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop to use for her schoolwork.

loans.name: Fouzia

texts.en:
Fouzia is 30; she is the mother of one child. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. Fouzia is a housewife, and looks after her family at home. 

Her husband owns a small dairy farm consisting of buffaloes and cows. He produces and sells dairy products like milk, curd, and butter.  He sells daily milk to different tea stalls. He is an honest man. He manages the household necessities with his earnings from milk sales. He speaks with a pleasant tone, which is impressive and he easily wins the trust of his clients. 

He was in need of one buffalo to increase his income, so Fouzia sought a loan. In this way, she can support her husband's business. 

She thanks Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a buffalo for milk sales.

loans.name: Mehmooda

texts.en:
Mehmooda’s age is 32; she is married, and living with her husband and seven children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. 

Mehmooda owns a small clothing shop in a nearby home. She purchases clothes from the market at a low price and sells them at a high price. The people of town like her clothing collection and selection a lot. Her family members appreciate her for her efforts. 

Now the summer season is going start. She wants to increase the variety of the clothing for the summer season; this is the reason she has requested a loan so that she can buy a fresh inventory of clothing to fulfill the demand. 

But she does not have cash in hand, due to a lot of household expenses.  

She has requested a loan so she can buy clothing for the summer season to fulfill the demand. 

She wishes for the bright future of her children; her dream is to provide a better education to her children. 

She is very thankful to Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy the summer season's clothing to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more bags of flour, bags of sugar, and cooking oil to expand her business.

loans.name: Sadafmo

texts.ru: Садафмо приветливая, отзывчивая, вежливая и милая женщина из Куляба. Она воспитывает троих детей. У нее трое сыновей.  Садафмо около 5 лет занимается шитьем национальной одежды на заказ. Ей нравится шить, кроить и она уверенна, что это работа ее жизни. Садафмо хочет купить швейную машинку и работать на дому, брать заказы на шитье. Для приобретения желаемой швейной машинки у Садафмо не хватает средств. Она решила взять кредит с надеждой на помощь.
texts.en: Sadafmo is a friendly, gregarious, happy and nice woman from Kulob. She is raising three children. She has three sons. For about 5 years, Sadafmo has been sewing ethnic Tajiik-style dresses on a by order basis. She likes to sew and cut patterns. She is sure that this profession is her life. Sadafmo wants to buy a sewing machine, work from home, and take sewing orders. Sadafmo does not have enough funds to buy a sewing machine. She decided to take out a loan and awaits your help.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Rugiatu

texts.en: Rugiatu is a 37-year-old woman from Waterloo Western in Freetown, Sierra Leone. She is married and the mother of four children.  For the past 15 years, she has earned a living by selling assorted drinks. She began her business to empower herself, and  works at the business from 8:00 am until 5:30 pm, six days per week. She says that the main challenges she faces are inflation and securing a proper sales location. Rugiatu is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying more drinks and water. She hopes that the extra income she earns from this loan will allow her to improve her standard of living and increase her income. In the future, she plans to continue to expand her business. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy drinks and water to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cooking oil, rice and seasonings to expand her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay university fees for this semester

loans.name: Arevik

texts.en:
Arevik is from Spandarian village, where she lives with her husband and 15-year-old son. Together with her husband, Arevik runs a farm. The farm includes livestock (cows, sheep, oxen, calves) and cultivates barley, emmer wheat, potatoes, and grass as a forage for the livestock. 

Arevik needs some financial assistance for her crops. She has applied for this loan of 3,000 USD to be able to purchase seeds and fuel for land cultivation. This loan is important for Arevik to have sufficient income from the sales of the harvest and sustain her family during the year.

loans.use: to pay for seeds and fuel for land cultivation

loans.name: Shyamali

texts.en:
Shyamali is a young mother who is raising two children (one son and one daughter) with her husband, Ajit. She is 32 years old and has a primary education. Her husband, who is 38 years old, is illiterate and can only sign his name. Her children are students of grade 4 and grade 10. They live in their own house in a small village, Sahapara, in Maynaguri in the district of Jalpaiguri.

Shyamali's husband is doing a small business, which is not running well. So, they are facing a financial crisis to manage all the necessities of their household expenses. Shyamali is a hardworking upbeat woman. She wants to join hands with her husband to run the family well. Since childhood, she has liked to sew. Currently, she is interested to start sewing women's clothing. So, she needs to purchase a sewing machine and thread, for which money is needed.

Shyamali has taken a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner), who gives loans to rural women to start up businesses. She wants to utilise the loan to purchase a sewing machine. She will start stitching women's clothing. Then she has an idea to start providing additional services, sewing covers and window curtains.

Shyamali is pleased to receive the needed amount to approach her treasured dreams to raise her children such that they will grow up with dignity. She wants to give them a good education in the future. For this, she wants to work tirelessly.  

In the future, she wants to expand her sphere of activity and thus improve the living conditions of her small family.

She thanks her lenders.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for her sewing business.

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen has successfully built her business of a general store with the support of Kiva and Kashf Foundation. She offers various goods for daily use. She has good communication skills and counts on a good client list. 

Previously, with the help of a Kiva loan, Parveen purchased different things needed for her business.  At present, she has requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy stocks of grains, sugar, and oil from the market, at lower rates. She then would be able to consistently meet the increasing demand. 

Parveen is in her fourth loan cycle and she has shown excellent repayment behavior. She wishes to utilize part of revenues to deal with personal expenses and to increase business capital.

loans.use: to buy stocks of grains, sugar, and oil.

loans.name: Jyparkul

texts.ru: Жыпаркул 52 года, вдова, одна воспитывает 4 детей. У Жыпаркул - среднее образование, Жыпаркул занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 15,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Жыпаркул, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 1 теленок, 3 кобылы, 1 жеребец, 20 овец с ягнятами. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS), также обрабатывает 1,9 ГА земли, где в основном выращивает -фасоль. Полученный урожай реализуют оптовым поставщикам. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Жыпаркул обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум"  за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Жыпаркул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотиных.
texts.en: Jyparkul is 52 years old, a widow, and is raising four children alone. Jyparkul has a secondary education. She practices livestock breeding and crop farming. She started this business 20 years ago with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 15,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Jyparkul's hard work, she currently has 1 milk cow, 1 calf, 3 mares, 1 stallion and 20 sheep with lambs on her farm. Her monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS). She also cultivates a 1.9 hectare plot of land on which she primarily grows beans. The gathered harvest is sold to wholesale distributors. For the purpose of further developing her business, Jyparkul turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan to buy sheep to increase the size of her herd. Jyparkul plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Kenjebu

texts.ru: Кенжебу 48 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Кенжебу - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Кенжебу занимается животноводством, стартовав 31 год назад, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Кенжебу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 10 овец и 2 яка. Ежемесячный доход составляет 17,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Кенжебу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Кенжебу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на свадьбу сына.
texts.en: Kenjebu is 48 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising three children. Kenjebu has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Kenjebu practices livestock breeding. She started this business 31 years ago with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 1,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Kenjebu's hard work, she currently has 2 milk cows, 10 sheep and 2 yaks on her farm. Her monthly income is 17,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Kenjebu turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Kenjebu plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money for her son's wedding.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Burulkan

texts.ru: Бурулкан 66 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Бурулкан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Бурулкан занимается животноводством, стартовав 46 лет назад, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Бурулкан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 4 овцы, 4 козы, 2 кобылы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Бурулкан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку кобыл для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Бурулкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на строительство нового дома для сына.
texts.en: Burulkan is 66 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising three children. Burulkan has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Burulkan practices livestock breeding. She started this business 46 years ago with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 1,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Burulkan's hard work, she currently has 2 milk cow, 4 sheep, 4 goats and 2 mares on her farm. Her monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Burulkan turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan to buy mares to increase the size of her herd. Burulkan plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to buy a new house for her son.

loans.use: to buy mares.

loans.name: Reynaldo Ismael

texts.es:
Reynaldo tiene 27 años de edad, recientemente finalizó sus estudios de bachillerato contador, no pudo continuar con los estudios universitarios debido a su situación económica y también porque no recibe ayuda de nadie, actualmente él está soltero y vive con su madre y dos hermanos.

Este joven presta sus servicios de ordenanza en el parque de la comunidad, ya tiene 2 años de dedicarse a esta actividad que es muy provechosa para él pues le genera buenos ingresos económicos, además desde que él estaba niño se dedica a la agricultura, en la siembra de granos básicos (maíz-frijol) y antes de iniciar este trabajo estudiaba el bachillerato. Él presta los servicios de ordenanza de 7:00 AM a 3:00 PM y le queda un par de horas para realizar los trabajos en sus cultivos. 

El préstamo que está solicitando a CrediCampo, lo utilizará para continuar la construcción de su casa,  específicamente comprará 1,000 tejas de barro para el techo, cuartones de madera, y pagará la mano de obra, de esta forma se le estará ayudando a Reynaldo a cubrir la necesidad de tener un hogar digno.
 
Sus propósitos a futuro son seguir estudiando y lograr sacar una carrera universitaria, sabe que lo puede lograr con esfuerzo y trabajo, también desea casarse, tener su propia familia y procrear hijos, conseguir un mejor trabajo que le genere mejores  ingresos económicos y que su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida y sabe que el crédito es un medio para lograr sus metas.
texts.en:
Reynaldo is 27 years old, and recently finished his high school degree in accounting.  He was not able to continue on to study at the university because of his financial situation, and also because he receives no financial help from anyone.  Right now he is single, and he lives with his mother and two brothers.

This young man works as an assistant in the park in his community.  He's already been doing this work for 2 years, and it is very rewarding to him because he earns a good income. In addition, ever since he was a child he has been working in agriculture.  He cultivates staple grains (corn and beans). Before he started this work he was studying for his degree.  Reynaldo works as an assistant from 7am until 3pm, which leaves him 2 hours a day to carry out his farming work.

Reynaldo is requesting this loan from CrediCampo to finance continuing work on his house.  Specifically, he will use the loan to buy 1,000 clay tiles for the roof and wooden beams, and also to pay for labor.  This loan will help Reynaldo to have a decent home.

Reynaldo's goal for the future is to continue to study and to get a university degree.  He knows that he can achieve this with effort and hard work.  He also wants to get married, have his own family, have children, and get a better job so that he could generate more income so that his family could have a better quality of life. Reynaldo knows that this loan is a means to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and to pay for labor

loans.name: José Maximiliano

texts.es:
José tiene 73 años de edad, no pudo ir a la escuela por lo que se dedicó a trabajar desde pequeño, actualmente está acompañado y tiene un hijo que ya no vive con él desde hace muchos años pues su hijo se casó y se fue a vivir a otro lugar, con  José solo vive un nieto que estudia bachillerato.
José se dedica a la siembra de maíz,  este trabajo se lo inculcaron sus padres, él cultiva dos hectáreas de tierra la cual alquila cada año en los meses de enero o marzo, él se levanta muy temprano para ir a supervisar la cosecha cuando esta ya esta sembrada.
El crédito solicitado lo invertirá para sembrar una hectárea de maíz, ya que un amigo suyo le prestará un terreno para este año, y los fondos que él posee no le alcanzan para cultivar, es por eso que solicita el crédito y espera que se le pueda ayudar para apoyar a su nieto en los estudios .
José sueña con que  su nieto logre graduarse del bachillerato sin ningún problema, ya que él no tuvo esa oportunidad cuando era joven, y por eso quiere ayudar a su nieto en todo lo que sea necesario.
texts.en:
José is 73 years old. He could not attend school because he had to work since he was very young. Now he has a partner. His son has not lived with him for many years because he married and left to live in another place. Only a grandson lives with José and he is in high school.

Jose farms corn, a skill his parents taught him. He cultivates two hectares of land that he rents every year in January or March. He gets up very early to go and supervise his crops after they are planted. He will invest the loan he is requesting in planting one hectare of corn since a friend will lend him a plot this year and he does not have sufficient funds to cultivate it. That is why he is applying for a loan so that he will be able to help his grandson with his studies.

José dreams that his grandson will graduate from high school without any problem because he, himself, never had that opportunity when he was young. Consequently he wants to help his grandson in every way possible..

loans.use: to plant a hectare of corn.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es: Justina es casada tiene un hijo, vive con sus padres en La Paz, en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que le pertenece a su familia. Justina se dedica a la elaboracion de bolsas para alimentos y su esposo trabaja en una farmacia. Justina necesita credito para comprar materiales para  hacer bolsas de plastico y de yute (una especie de hilado)
texts.en:
Justina is married, she has a child, and she lives with her parents in La Paz, in a house made of brick and cement that belongs to her family.

Justina makes grocery bags, and her husband works in a pharmacy. 

Justina needs a loan in order to purchase materials for making bags from plastic, and from jute (a kind of yarn).

loans.use: to purchase materials for making bags from plastic and jute for her grocery bag sales business.

loans.name: Dúo Mujeres De Bien Group

texts.es:
DUO MUJERES DE BIEN
Este dúo formado por doña Marta, es casada Y tiene 1 hijo y solicita este crédito para incrementar su negocio de venta de ropa típica que tiene hace 3 años, ella vende blusas, güipiles, cortes sanjuaneros, delantales, va a ofrecer en diferentes lugares como sacsuy, Montufar, y ahora quiere comprar blusas de elásticos y de diferentes tamaños porque comienza la época de calor y le han pedido varias estilos y no tiene para invertir, solicita este credito para la compra de ropa tipica para la venta.
texts.en:
Marta is one of the members of the "Duo Mujeres de Bien" group. She is married and has one son. Marta is asking for this loan to grow her business selling traditional clothing, which she has had for three years. She sells blouses, "güipiles" [traditional shirts], "cortes sanjuaneros" [traditional skirts] and aprons in various locations such as Sacsuy and Montufar. 

Now Marta wants buy elastic blouses and different sizes because the warm season is starting and customers have been asking for different styles. She does not have any money to invest and is asking for a loan to buy traditional clothing for sale.

loans.use: to buy traditional clothing for sale.

loans.name: Oemardath

texts.en:
Oemardath is 31 years old and lives with his parents. When he was 15 years old, his father lost one of his feet during a collision. Because Oemardath was the oldest at home, he had to leave his school to work in his father’s fields. 

Oemardath has no collateral to take a bank loan. Therefore he approached Seva MFI for a small loan. He has been a customer of Seva MFI for three years and repaid all of his loans on time. According to Oemardath, Seva MFI gives, "the right amount on the right time," whereby his income increased. He is approaching Seva MFI again for a loan of SRD 7,500 to buy fertilizers and pesticides. With these loans he tries to save for his wedding!

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos, se le presenta la necesidad de solicitar un nuevo crédito debido a que la bicicleta en la que sale a vender pan se le daño, pagara las reparaciones de la bicicleta y comprara variedad de pan para la reventa.
El crédito anterior ha sido de mucha importancia en el negocio de Carlos puesto que ha contado con los recursos económicos para adquirir el producto que ofrece a sus clientes, hoy en día cuenta con más clientes nuevos, mejores ventas y una economía más estable.
texts.en: Carlos needs to apply for a new loan because the bicycle he uses to sell bread is broken. He will pay for the bicycle repairs and buy various breads to resell. The previous loan was very important to Carlos' business since he had the financial resources to buy the products to offer his customers. Today, he has several new customers, better sales, and more stable finances.

loans.use: to pay for bicycle repairs and to buy various breads for resale.

loans.name: Shephali

texts.en:
Shephali is a 31-year-old woman from the small village of Tekatuli in Maynaguri in the district of Jalpaiguri. She is married and has only one son who is too young to go to school.  Her husband Krishna is involved in agricultural work.  He is 35 and has a primary education whereas Shephali is illiterate.  They live in their own kachha house (made of mud, wood and bamboo).

Shephali's husband is a farmer. They have ancestral land where he grows different kinds of vegetables in different seasons and sells the produce in the local markets. The earning from the agribusiness is not sufficient to overcome the financial hurdles that they are facing now. He needs to invest more money in his business to get a better income, but the major challenge is insufficient funds. So they have decided to start a new business of supplying milk in addition to their agribusiness.

Shephali has taken a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner). She wants to use the loan to buy a dairy cow.  She plans to sell milk from door to door to her neighbors, which will bring additional profit.  Moreover, the cow dung can be used as manure on their farmland.

Shephali believes that this business will help to improve their living standards and also assist with her children's education.

She is very much thankful to the lenders (BJS and Kiva) for funding her loan to make her dreams come true.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow to start a milk selling business.

loans.name: Shikha

texts.en:
Shikha is a rural housewife. She is 45 years old and studied up to grade four. Her family consists of her husband and one school-going son. He reads in grade seven. Her husband Bimal, 61 years old, is engaged in a small business.  They live in their own kachha house (made of bamboo, mud and straw) in Maynaguri in the district of Jalpaiguri.

The earnings from her husband's business are scanty and they are unable to manage the family expenses as well as the educational costs of her son. He is struggling hard all day but fails to earn adequate income for the family, so Shikha has requested a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to purchase chilie seeds and fertilizers. She has decided to cultivate chilies on their farm. She hopes this will be a lucrative business as the product is in great demand in her locality.

With the income from her business, she plans to give financial help to her family and give a proper education to her son.  With the spirit of getting ahead and the determination to prosper, she wants to continue with the business and make it more and more profitable so she can give her family a better quality of life
.
Shikha gives her thanks to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and fertilizers for cultivation of chilies.

loans.name: Kamolidin

texts.ru: Камолиддину 31 год, женат, вместе с супругой воспитывают 2 детей. У Камолиддина- среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Камолиддин занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 13 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Камолиддина, в его хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, а также имеет земельный надел размером 0,45 ГА, на которой выращивает картофель, кукурузу, хлопок. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Камолиддин обратился в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом - на покупку коров для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Камолиддин планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и намерен собрать средства на покупку автомашины.
texts.en: Kamolidin is 31 years old, married, and together with his wife, is raising two children. Kamolidin has a secondary education. As the main source of income for his family, Kamolidin practices livestock breeding and crop farming. He started this business 13 years ago with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Kamolidin's hard work, he currently has 2 milk cows on his farm as well as a 0.45 hectare plot of land on which he grows potatoes, corn and cotton.  His monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing his business, Kamolidin turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." He is requesting a loan to buy cows to fatten up and then resell at the market for a high price. Kamolidin plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. He also is determined to save money to buy a car.

loans.use: to buy cows for fattening up and resale.

loans.name: Saltanat

texts.ru: Салтанат 40 лет. Совместно с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. В 2006 году, супруги начали бизнес в торговле канцелярских и хозяйственных товаров, используя в качестве стартового капитала сумму в 10,000 сом (KGS). Сумев развить свой бизнес и обретя постоянных клиентов, Салтанат имеет среднемесячный доход в сумме 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду в бизнесе, Салтанат увеличила свой товарооборот. В целях дальнейшего увеличения и расширения своего бизнеса, Салтанат обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку канцелярских и хозяйственных товаров оптом для продажи в дальнейшем по розничной цене. Доходы от кредита Салтанат планирует вложить в покупку магазина для торговли.
texts.en: Saltanat is 40 years old. Together with her husband, she is raising three children. In 2006, the couple started their own business of selling office and home supplies. They started this business with initial start-up capital in the amount of 10,000 som (KGS). Having been able to develop her business and attract loyal customers, Saltanat has an average monthly income of 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to the hard work put into her business, Saltanat has increased her sales turnover. For the purpose of further increasing and expanding her business, Saltanat turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan to buy wholesale office and home supplies to sell in the future at a mark-up . Saltanat plans to invest the earnings from the loan to buy a shop for selling merchandise.

loans.use: to buy office and household products for retail sale.

loans.name: Sarnabala

texts.en:
Sarnabala is an active and hardworking woman from the small village of Tekatuli in Maynaguri in the district of Jalpaiguri.  She is 55 years old, married and a housewife.  She is married to Naresh who is a farmer by profession.  Together they are raising two school-going children (one son and one daughter) who are in grade 12 and grade 9.  Sarnabala is illiterate and can only sign her name but her husband studied up to grade six. They live in their own house.

Sarnabala's husband started crop farming 10 years ago and continues this business to this day. They have a small farm where he grows crops like green vegetables, potatoes, etc. With the help of his wife and children, he sells the produce to the local markets.  But due to the price increase of essential commodities, it has become impossible for him to run the family well. So they have decided to cultivate chilies on their farmland, which is a crop in great demand.

Sarnabala is a very proactive and hardworking woman who does her best to sustain her husband's agribusiness.  She has taken a loan from BJS to purchase chili seeds and fertilizers to cultivate on their farmland.

They hope to earn additional profit from this business to reach their goals of educating their children properly and providing better financial conditions for their family.

She is thankful to both Kiva and BJS.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and fertilizers to cultivate chilies.

loans.name: Maa Chanchala Shg Group

texts.en:
Maa Chanchala Self Help Group consists of 11 members, all of whom are women. These entrepreneurs are very humble, hardworking and responsible people with good manners and lots of enthusiasm to improve their lives. One of them is Sabita who was selected as their president. 

Sabita is a 29-year-old lady living with her husband and her two children. The lady standing with her raised hand is Sabita. Her husband works as a laborer in a factory situated near her village. She runs a variety shop to help her husband financially. She sells betel, grains, lentils, spices, biscuits, soap, detergent, hair oil, etc. in her shop. She has developed a very good relationship with her customers in the village. She likes the fact that she can cater to the needs of the people in her village. Sabita has a plan to make her shop bigger and keep multiple things in her shop to meet her customers' demands. She also wants to purchase items for her shop in bulk directly from the wholesalers. For this, she has requested a loan to purchase items like toothbrushes, toothpaste, soft drinks, wheat flour, rice and other household consumables. Sabita, along with her group members, has requested a loan amount of 165,000 INR.

loans.use: To purchase toothbrushes, toothpaste, soft drinks, wheat flour, rice and other household consumables for her variety shop.

loans.name: Jamal

texts.ru: Жамал 59 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Жамал - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Жамал занимается животноводством, стартовав 9 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Жамал, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 6 дойных коров и 20 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Жамал обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом - на покупку овец для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Жамал планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Jamal is 59 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising four children. Jamal has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Jamal practice livestock breeding. She started this business 9 years ago with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Jamal's hard work, she currently has 6 milk cows and 20 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Jamal turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan to buy sheep for fattening up and then selling at the market for a high price. Jamal plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock.

loans.use: to buy sheep for fattening up and resale.

loans.name: Hurije

texts.en:
Hurije, her husband, and their four sons live in a small village in Kosovo. She stays home caring for the family, their needs, and the home, while her husband works in agriculture. He works on the land of others for a fee in order to make a living. The house that they all live in is very small with only two rooms. For many years now she has tried to expand her house to fit their needs and family size, but was never able to manage to do so because of the lack of income. 

Now Hurije has decided that through KosInvest she will request a loan to purchase the building materials necessary to create an addition to the house. The loan will improve the life of her children, giving them additional space for studying and sleeping. She is very grateful for this opportunity. Knowing that this is a Kiva loan, she appreciates all of the lenders.

loans.use: To purchase the building materials necessary to create an addition to the house

loans.name: Nurbek

texts.ru: Нурбек активный молодой житель района Яван. Ему 20 лет. Он учится и одновременно работает. Нурбек холост и живет в доме с родителями. Он позитивный и целеустремленный молодой человек. Нурбек учится в первом курсе Педагогического Института по специальности "Английский язык". Он совмещает учебу с работой. Нурбек работает кредитным экспертом в Микрокредитной депозитной организации. За свой учебный год Нурбек еще не оплатил, так как у него нет сбережений. Единственное решение он видит в получении кредита. Нурбек надеется на вашу поддержку. Он хочет успешно закончить ВУЗ.
texts.en: Nurbek is an active, young resident of the Yavan District. He is 20 years old. He works and studies at the same time. Nurbek is a bachelor and lives at home with his parents. He is a positive and goal-driven young man. Nurbek is in his first year at the Pedagogical Institute in the English Language department. He combines school with work. Nurbek works as a credit expert in a microlending deposit-taking organization. Nurbek has still not paid for his tuition as he does not have any savings. The only solution he could see was to take out a loan. Nurbek relies on your support. He wants to successfully graduate from university.

loans.use: to pay for his university tuition.

loans.name: Rina

texts.en:
Rina is a 29 -year-old woman from the small town of Moynaguri in the district of Jalpaiguri. She is illiterate, a housewife and a mother of one son. Her husband Shiben, 35 years old, is a motor driver by profession. Their son reads in grade two. They live happily in their own house.

Rina's husband is a car driver who works on a for hire basis.  He has no car of his own. But he has a small motorcycle repair shop in the market. He has been working on motorcycle repairs for more than 10 years to make his living. He started this business to increase his income and improve his living.  It was an impressive step forward and that's why he works hard.  But still, he is unable to give a better living to his family. Specifically, he can't give a good education to his children.  So he needs to expand her business by purchasing more motorcycle spare parts.

Rina has taken a step to help her husband.  She has taken a loan from BJS.  They want to use the loan to purchase more motorcycle spare parts.  She hopes that they will be able to develop his business and increase his income to give a better living to the family.

They give their hearty thanks to the lenders (BJS and Kiva) for making their dreams come true.

loans.use: To purchase motorcycle spare parts for her husband's shop.

loans.name: Ranu

texts.en:
Ranu, 29 years old, is a woman from a remote village, Modhya Khagrabari, in Maynaguri in the district of Jalpaiguri. She lives with her husband and two children (daughters) in their own kachha house (made of straw and mud). Both the husband and wife have primary education. Their daughters are below the school-going age.  Her husband, Entaj, aged 34 years, is engaged in agriculture.

Ranu's husband has ten years of experience in farming, which he learnt from his parents. The land that he cultivates is his own, thanks to an inheritance from her parents. With the help of his wife, Ranu gives hard toil to cultivate different vegetables. They sell the produce in the local markets. In this way, he somehow manages the family expenses. In order to increase their income, they have decided to start cultivating chilies, which are a profitable crop, on their farmland.

Ranu is a persistent and very hardworking woman. She has taken a loan from Kiva's partner, BJS. She plans to use the loan to purchase seeds and fertilizers to start chili cultivation.

Ranu's plan for the future is to grow a variety of other vegetables to generate more income to give the family better financial sustenance. Her dream is to see her daughters become professional with a college education.

She and her husband both are grateful to BJS as well as to Kiva for funding the loan to carry on their agribusiness.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and manure for cultivation of chilies.

loans.name: Nazia

texts.en: Nazia is 35 years old and the mother of four children. For four years, Nazia has been running a business selling milk with her husband (who is also shown in the photo). She initiated her own business by buying a buffalo to support her family as her husband is a laborer with a low salary income. With the passage of time her sales increased and also her income. This has all happened due to her courage and determination. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family matters as well as financial matters. She has some savings and has applied for a loan of PKR 60,000 to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. She is in her 7th loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Sheuli

texts.en:
Sheuli is a 24-year-old woman from a small village in Maynaguri in the district of Jalpaiguri.  Her family consists of her husband and one school-going son who reads in grade three.  Sheuli is uneducated but her husband attended school up to grade eight. They live in their own house.

Sheuli's husband Monotosh, 32 years old, started his agribusiness with the help of his father from whom he inherited several acres of land on which he grows crops.  Sheuli, though a housewife, helps her husband in his work.  They grow different vegetables in different seasons. This is how he gradually prospered economically. But with the increase in the price of essential commodities, their household expenses have also increased, which he cannot cover with his small income.  So, he feels that he should expand his agribusiness by growing more vegetables.

To help her husband, Sheuli has taken a loan from Kiva’s partner, BJS, who gives loans to rural women.  She will use the loan to purchase more vegetable seeds to cultivate on their land.  She hopes to earn additional profit from this and cover all the needs of the family, including their son's educational expenses.

In the future, she would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's financial stability.

She is thankful to Kiva and BJS.

loans.use: To purchase more vegetable seeds

loans.name: Jumagul

texts.ru: Эту скромную сельскую девушку зовут Чумагул. Ей 27 лет. Она еще не замужем и живет с матерью и отцом в районе Носири Хусрав. Чумагул продолжает ремесло своего отца. Вот уже 3 года как она занимается выращиванием коров и бычков. Она любит животных и время проведенное с ними на природе приносит ей удовольствие. Чумагул сейчас хочет увеличить поголовье скота, так как сейчас сезон для животноводства. На местном пастбище уже выросли свежие травы - корм для скотов. В связи с этим Чумагул просит кредит, чтобы приобрести скот. Этот кредит ей очень важен.
texts.en: This modest country girl's name is Jumagul. She is 27 years old. She is not yet married and lives with her mother and father in the Nosiri Khusrav District. Jumagul continues the trade of her father. For three years already, she has been raising cows and bull calves. She loves animals and enjoys spending time with them in nature. Jumagul now wants to increase her number of cattle as it is currently the cattle breeding season. The local pastures have already grown fresh grasses, which is feed for the cattle. In connection with this, Jumagul is requesting a loan to buy cattle. This loan is very important to her.

loans.use: to buy cattle to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Edith Karen

texts.es:
ID KIVA 
Edith tiene 23 años de edad es soltera. Ella es una joven que trabaja como teleoperadora y estudia la carrera técnica de diseño de modas. Ella se siente muy satisfecha ya que solo le falta 02 años para culminar su carrera técnica. Ella tiene como fin laborar en una empresa textil en donde pueda aplicar sus conocimientos  y todo su talento que es el diseño de modas y crear su propia empresa y boutique y sobre todo tener su propia marca de modas. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de  materiales de diseño. Ella agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado.
texts.en: Edith is 23 years old and is single.  She is a young person who works as a telemarketer and is studying for a degree in fashion design.  She feels very satisfied because she needs only 2 more years to finish her college degree.  Her goal is to work in a textile company where she could apply her knowledge and her talent in fashion design.  She would like to create her own company and boutique, and most of all, to have her own fashion brand.  Edith will use this loan to buy materials for her designs.  She thanks the Kiva lenders for the loan that they are providing.

loans.use: to buy materials for her designs

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Hello- this is Anita, a businesswoman from Waterloo, in northern Freetown. She is married to a man who works in the local area. They have one child. 

Anita started her business to take care of her family. She sells palm oil in a nearby town. Palm oil is heavily relied upon in local homes as it is the base for spicy, local (and affordable) stews such as ‘crain-crain’ or ‘rice and cassava leaf.' She works from 8:00 AM to 6:30 PM and then tends to her family. Even though Anita is proud of her business, it faces challenges from the poor transportation infrastructure in the area. This makes travelling to purchase stock or reach new markets slow and expensive. 

Anita would like to use this loan to buy palm oil in bulk (by the gallon). This would allow her business to remain profitable. She would like to thank BRAC Sierra Leone and the Kiva lenders for helping her and her business.

loans.use: to buy palm oil in bulk (by the gallon)

loans.name: Mamoni

texts.en:
Mamoni is only 24 years old. She is married and a mother of only one son who is too young to go to school.  Mamoni is married to Nitish, 25 years old, and is involved in a small business.  This young couple has only a primary education and could not study further due to their parents' lack of economic resources. They live in Maynaguri in the district of Jalpaiguri in their own small house.

Mamoni's husband earns so little that it is hardly sufficient to cover the basic needs of such a small family.  He purchases goods (stationary items) from wholesalers and sells them to the local retailers.  So at present, they are facing a financial crisis to make both ends meet.  They have a plot of ancestral land. They have decided to cultivate tea plants there. Tea leaves are in good demand in the market, so they thought that the business would be a lucrative one.

She is requesting a loan to buy inputs such tea saplings, manure, and fertilizers for starting tea cultivation.  With this support, she will be able to fulfill her mission.  Her dream is to improve her cultivation techniques to grow more tea plants so that she will be able to generate more income for the wellbeing of her family and the future of her son.

She also wants to improve her crop a little every day so that she can increase the variety and quality of her harvests.

Her full thanks go to her lenders BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase saplings and manure for tea cultivation.

loans.name: Monu

texts.en:
Monu is a 24-year-old rural housewife from the village of Bagnan in Maynaguri in the district of Jalpaiguri.  She lives with her husband and child in her own house. She is blessed with one son who is in school.  He reads in grade five. Monu's husband Abubokor is 31 years old and a farmer by profession.  They are uneducated and can only sign their names, as their parents were people of few economic means.

Monu's husband has cultivated different crops for more than 10 years.
